title: Join using newly created account (PBE)

replies.body:
We've certainly had some times where we tested certain features and wanted players under level 30 to test them, but in general, we look for players that are really active and can provide great feedback. The criteria we use to select testers changes quite often, though, so remaining active on this account is the best way to work towards getting accepted for PBE access. 

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for additional details and let me know if you have any questions.

Never heard of someone accepted for the PBE without being level 30, sorry :(. Riot is usually looking for experienced players who can provide constructive feedback and track bugs. You can still apply though, you never know.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ
